p.span: Buttons of the top panel

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:14pt; font-weight:600; color:#00aa00;

p.span: This panel contains buttons that allow you to manipulate the model
(Each button has its own hot keys!)

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;
-qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;
-qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

p.span: Add object (CTRL + A) -

creates a new object with the camera coordinates and parameters of the selected template, if there are no templates, then first a standard template is added to the list, and then a new object is created using it (the object is added to the end of the list of all objects)

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: Delete object (CTRL + D или Delete) -
deletes the selected object, if no object is selected, nothing happens

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: 3. Delete all objects (CTRL + ALT + D) -
deletes all existing objects in the model

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: 4. To move the camera to the center coordinates (CTRL + F) -
the camera moves to the origin

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: 5. To reset the zoom (CTRL + L) -
sets the camera scale to 100%

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: 6. Make the coordinate center of the selected object (CTRL + X) -
sets the coordinates of the selected object as initial (works at the same time, if the object is moving, its coordinates will be different from the initial ones after a while)

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: 7. Make the speed of the selected object world speed (CTRL + V) -
sets the world speed equal to the speed of the selected object. World speed - the speed at which all objects move in the simulation, by default it is 0.

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: 8. Monitor the selected object (CTRL + CAPSLOCK) -
the camera will move for the selected object (possible twitching of the object being monitored, but it does not affect the properties of its movement)

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: 9. To set the point of no return (CTRL + C) -
sets the current state of the simulation as a return point (the model File is not saved!)

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: 10. To restore the state of the simulation to the point of no return (CTRL + R) -
makes the state of the model equal to what it was when the return point was set

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: 11. Add/Remove the pause (CTRL + P) -
stop/start the simulation

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;
-qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; font-weight:600; color:#000000;

p.span: Attention! If you select some input field value, some hotkeys may not work, if so - click on an empty area in one of the browsers.
